instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: AI/Machine Vision Engineer III

Job Description:
About the job
Job Description
Join us in our brand new 8500 sqft innovation center in Austin, where we focus on solving our customers' greatest unmet needs with disruptive solutions to enable our customers to deliver the best patient outcomes.
We are seeking a talented and motivated Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Engineer to join our team. This engineer will primarily focus on artificial intelligence systems for robotic systems and other applications for customer solutions. Experience in robotic controls is a bonus.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and implement Artificial Intelligence Solutions for customer Problems
Collaborate with cross-functional teams from product, engineering, services, sales and other key stakeholders to rapidly prototype solutions.
Work in a lean startup environment, starting with problems to be solved and hacking together prototypes for customer validation.
Engage with customers to gather feedback and iterate on solutions.
Push the envelope in engineering solutions, with a focus on disruptive and innovative approaches.
Required Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field with a focus on Artificial Intelligence
3+ years of experience in AI/ML engineering with demonstrated proficiency in languages such as Python and C++.
2+ Years of experience in ML Lifecycle.
Preferred Skills:
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, and bonus points for ROS 2.
Understanding of machine learning techniques and their application in robotics.
Understanding of GPU selection and use.
Advanced experience with Python, Databricks, R, and other ML libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Proficiency with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP) and ML deployment services, such as Azure ML, Vertex AI, or AWS SageMaker. Airflow or MLflow experience is a plus.
Strong understanding of full-stack development including Api development and containerization.
Deep familiarity with machine learning and generative AI methodologies, with knowledge of platforms like Microsoft’s Semantic Kernel, Google’s Vertex AI, or OpenAI AP
Proficiency in both front-end and back-end tools and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, D3.js, Node.js) for building tools that support SRE and Operations oriented teams
Understanding of databases and ETl pipelines. Vector DB experience is a plus.
Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced, startup-like environment.
Extra points for attempting to build something revolutionary that failed and learning from the experience.
Proven track record of developing disruptive solutions in an entrepreneurial setting.
Experience in healthcare is a bonus.
About Us
Since 1992, Omnicell has been committed to transforming pharmacy care through outcomes-centric innovation designed to optimize clinical and business outcomes across all settings of care. We strive to be the healthcare provider’s most trusted partner by our guiding promise of “Outcomes. Defined and Delivered.”
Our comprehensive portfolio of robotics, smart devices, intelligent software, and expert services is helping healthcare facilities worldwide to improve business and clinical outcomes as they move closer to the industry vision of the Autonomous Pharmacy.
Our guiding principles inform everything we do:
As Passionate Transformers, we find a better way to innovate relentlessly.
Being Mission Driven, we consistently deliver on our promises.
Our Entrepreneurial spirit makes the most of EVERY opportunity for innovation.
Understanding that Relationships Matter creates synergies that yield the greatest benefits for all.
Intellectually Curious, eager to think deeper to learn and improve.
In Doing the Right Thing, we lead by example in ALL we do.
We are deeply committed to Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) initiatives. Our ESG efforts focus on creating an inclusive culture and a healthier world. This includes our Employee Impact Groups, which foster inclusion and belonging, as well as our learning and well-being programs that support personal and professional growth. We also prioritize sustainability in our operations, aiming to reduce our environmental footprint and promote responsible business practices. Join us in transforming the pharmacy care delivery model, making patient care safer and smarter for all.
About The Team
Omnicell is dedicated to fostering an inclusive workplace. We welcome applications from all individuals, valuing a wide range of perspectives and backgrounds. As an equal opportunity employer, we do not discriminate based on race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, or disability. We are committed to making our recruitment process accessible to everyone. We offer support and reasonable adjustments for individuals with disabilities during our hiring process. If you need assistance, please contact us at Recruiting@omnicell.com .
At Omnicell, respect for privacy and confidentiality is paramount. We adhere to strict policies to prevent discrimination or retaliation against those who engage in open conversations about compensation. However, employees privy to compensation information as part of their job role are expected to maintain confidentiality, except in specific circumstances outlined by law, such as during formal complaints, investigations, or as required by legal obligations.
Please note that Omnicell reserves the right to modify job roles and responsibilities as needed to meet our organization's evolving needs and drive our mission forward.

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output:
Here is a tailored resume for the AI/Machine Vision Engineer III position:

SATHVIK ADDICHARLA
Denton, TX 76207 | sathvikaddicharla@my.unt.edu | +1 (940) 597-5745 | [LinkedIn] | [GitHub]
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
AI/ML engineer with deep experience designing scalable and rapid-prototype solutions using LLMs, RAG, and deep learning architectures. Strong background in building AI-native applications, deploying ML models, and collaborating cross-functionally in agile and startup-like environments. Proficient in Python, C++, ML lifecycle management, containerized deployment, and cloud services. Passionate about developing disruptive healthcare and robotics-adjacent systems through innovative experimentation and fast feedback loops.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Core ML/AI: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, Transformers, LangChain, RAG, LSTM
Languages: Python, C++, SQL
Model Lifecycle & Deployment: MLflow, Docker, FastAPI, Flask, REST APIs, AWS (S3, SageMaker), GCP (Vertex AI), Airflow (familiar)
Computer Vision & Robotics: OpenCV, Librosa, FFmpeg, PyAudio, ROS 2 (conceptual knowledge)
Vector Search & Semantic AI: FAISS, Whisper, LangGraph
Tooling & Infra: GitHub, Linux, Databricks (exposure), ETL pipelines, API Integration
Dev Skills: Agile collaboration, rapid prototyping, front-end/backend collaboration awareness
EDUCATION
Master’s in Data Science
University of North Texas | 04/2024 – 08/2026 | GPA: 3.66/4.0
Bachelor’s in Computer Science – Data Science
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Technology, India | GPA: 8.60/10
EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer Intern
Cantellate Software Pvt Ltd | Hyderabad, India | 03/2023 – 09/2023
Delivered 3 ML prototypes using PyTorch, reducing inference latency by 40% and boosting customer prediction accuracy by 85%.
Built AI models integrated with AWS for real-time fraud detection, saving ~$500K monthly with sub-100ms latency.
Developed RAG-based assistant using Hugging Face, LangChain, and FAISS; fine-tuned vector search and prompt pipelines.
Led ML lifecycle integration: MLflow tracking, Docker containers, REST API services, and collaborative code reviews.
Worked across functions including cloud engineers and customer-facing teams to refine AI use cases through iterative demos.
PROJECTS
LLM Health Diagnostics Chatbot (IEEE Published)
Built a retrieval-enhanced LLM system using LangGraph and Hugging Face for condition-based diagnosis support.
Integrated prompt engineering (few-shot, CoT) and monitored performance with MLflow in production-like pipelines.
YouTube Summarizer with Whisper + FAISS
Created a video summarizer with OpenAI’s Whisper and vector embeddings; deployed via Flask with ~92% accuracy.
Showcased full-stack pipeline awareness including backend orchestration and ETL of video data.
Speech Emotion Detection Using LSTM + MFCC
Built LSTM-based speech emotion recognizer with MFCC and OpenCV integration for visual dashboards.
Applied advanced noise reduction and data augmentation techniques for training across accents.
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
Deep Learning – NPTEL (IIT Ropar)
Training LLMs with Own Data – DeepLearning.ai
Python for Data Science and Machine Learning – Udemy
Google Data Analytics – Coursera
PUBLICATIONS
LLM-based Diagnostic Chatbot using RAG and LangChain – IEEE (09/2024)
Transfer Learning for Autism Detection in Children – IEEE (08/2024)
